title: Relates to the repayment, in certain circumstances, of grant money awarded under the JOBS Now program and grant money issued by an industrial development agency
summary: Relates to the repayment, in certain circumstances, of grant money awarded under the JOBS Now program and grant money issued by an industrial development agency; if the private company receiving the grant money leaves the state within five years after the distribution of the grant money, then the private company must repay the grant money.
lawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act

         circumstances, of grant money awarded under the JOBS Now  program  and
         grant money issued by an industrial development agency
